Name: Oranjiniha
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A tall, richly flavoured orange drink.
History: Created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Oranjiniha contains 219 calories
